page.title: 14EAST PRESTON COMMUNITY.
page.content:
{East Preston Parish Council.
Wearing her medallion of office Mrs. Brett, a school govenor and Chairman of the parish council visited us. The blue/green abalone shell set in silver was presented to the council by E. Miller. Elected every 4 years the council meet regularly in the New Village Hall. They attend to local affairs like the need for street lighting, grass cutting or as recently the building of the much needed car park by the Village Green. She enjoys the friendly atmosphere but deplores the amount of litter in the village. { { EAST PRESTON LIBRARY. { }Mrs. Wagstaff explained that the library built in 1962 was opened by Ernest Raymond.Recent extentions have provided much needed shelf space for
